trial_phase.Description: Whether the trial was before or after the unfiltered speech, or whether it *was* the unfiltered speech

trial_num.Description: The trial to which the set of bef/mid/aft events corresponds

filt_type.Description: The type of sound filtering used to degrade the stimulus

noise_stim.Description: Whether the middle sound was noise (no linguistic context given) or unfiltered speech (full linguistic content)
